/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The sky is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it. The street itself is lined with power lines and telephone poles, adding a touch of urbanity to the scene. On either side of the street, there are trees and shrubs, their green hues contrasting with the blue of the sky. In the distance, a few buildings can be seen, their details softened by the distance. The image is bathed in the light of a sunny day, casting soft shadows and highlighting the textures of the various elements in the scene.
